roleset.name: charge too much
roleset.note: OVERPRICE-V NOTES: Probably should be viewed as an adjective, since I can't get any goodreadings with an agent present. (from overprice.01-v)
OVERPRICED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from overpriced.01-j)

example.name: passive, no agent
example.text: ``Or if they feel [the wine]-1 is overpriced *trace*-1 and they can get something equally good for less.''
